name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: Learn the fundamentals of computer science, programming, and problem-solving.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Learn how to organize data efficiently and implement algorithms.

name: Databases and Information Systems
description: Introduction to relational databases, SQL, and data management.

name: Operating Systems
description: Understand how operating systems manage resources and processes.

name: Web and Mobile Development
description: Build web and mobile applications using modern frameworks.

name: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
description: Introduction to AI and ML algorithms and applications.

name: Cybersecurity and Ethical Hacking
description: Learn about network security, cyber threats, and ethical hacking practices.

name: Cloud Computing and Big Data
description: Understand cloud platforms and processing of large-scale data.

name: Robotics and Embedded Systems
description: Learn robotics principles, sensors, and embedded system programming.

name: Advanced Software Engineering
description: Learn software project management, testing, and design patterns.
